title: Mastering Past Perfect Tense
objectives: Understand Past Perfect at Beginner level
Apply Past Perfect in real conversations

vocabulary.example: I ate before I went out.

vocabulary.definition: At no time in the past

content.introduction: Welcome to this lesson on Past Perfect.
content.explanation: In this lesson, you will learn about Past Perfect at the Beginner level.
tips: Practice Past Perfect daily for best results.

exercises.question: Choose the correct sentence:
options: She had gone before I arrived.
She has gone before I arrived.
She had gone before I arrived.

exercises.question: Describe a time when you had completed something before another event.

culturalNote: Past Perfect is common in storytelling, especially in American history narratives and personal stories, to show sequences clearly.
